tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE off_chain_data (
    id SERIAL,
    data_hash VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    blockchain_transaction_id INT,
    metadata JSONB,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL,
    block_number INT,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_links (
    link_id SERIAL,
    data_id INT,
    transaction_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES off_chain_data (id),
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES blockchain_transactions (transaction_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (link_id)
);

CREATE TABLE off_chain_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_value TEXT,
    transaction_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_number INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sender_address VARCHAR(50),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE data_links (
    link_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    off_chain_data_id INT,
    blockchain_transaction_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (off_chain_data_id) REFERENCES off_chain_data(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (blockchain_transaction_id) REFERENCES blockchain_transactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_relationships (
    relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_data_id INT,
    child_data_id INT,
    relationship_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_data_id) REFERENCES off_chain_data(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (child_data_id) REFERENCES off_chain_data(id)
);
